name: Proud Father
description:
You will take control of the main character and pursue any of the girls you like. You have three daughters, a sister, niece and lots of other girls to pursue. There will be many different routes to take.

I'm new to all of this. Rendering, coding and story telling. But due to covid 19 I have some spare time on my hands so thought I'd give it a shot. The game will be inconsistent to begin with but I'm sure with practice and time I'll get better and quality of renders and story will improve.

Game support:

English only for now.

Mac and PC. Android to come in future.

Game is not censored for now. (May need a pach in the future.)
